remarks: Define existential quantification. ` E. x ph ` means "there exists at least one set ` x ` such that ` ph ` is true."  Axiom 10 of 10 for intuitionistic logic.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 31-Jan-2015.)
statement: ax-ie2 $p |- ( A. x ( ps -> A. x ps ) -> ( A. x ( ph -> ps ) <-> ( E. x ph -> ps ) ) ) $.
